turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I'm trying to get some pizzas tonight.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Need four small pizzas. I need one of them to be a taco pizza, one of them to be meat lovers, one of them to be.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's get the Indian pizza, and one of them to be.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, we are not serving taco pizzas at the moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. And one of them to be.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Chicago style pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to substitute the topping?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Let's go with the Chicago Chicago should be Chicago thin crust, but the other one we can do a California-style.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: there are no chicago pizzas with thin crust available at this time.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I totally totally understand. How about a New York style, then?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: with thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, can you please repeat the other topping preferences?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I thought you would have him down.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: please repeat the toppings you would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, so I need an Indian style pizza a New York style pizza these are all small pizzas and they are all thin crust. So, an Indian style pizza, a meat lovers pizza, a New York style pizza, and a California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have 4 small pizzas, meatlovers, california style, new york style and, indian style with thin crusts.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any special ingredients?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just a standard on all your orders should be fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $76.88.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be available for pickup in 57 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Mhm.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thanks.
